Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Loyola. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Loyola.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses temp. rerouted EB: Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash; WB: Wabash and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Roosevelt/Michigan, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Michigan, 16th, and Wabash.

Westbound buses will operate via Wabash and Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/109th
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Cottage Grove, 107th, and King Drive due to, fire department activity at King Drive/109th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily reroutedin both directions via 111th, Cottage Grove, 107th, and King Drive due to, fire department activity at King Drive/109th.

Allow extra travel time.
